verbs.description: [V: sleeping] [ARGM-TMP: more than 8 hours a night] may be a deadly warning sign it well known that getting enough sleep is vital for staying healthy but excessive snoozing looks to be linked to a higher risk of heart problems and even a higher mortality risk according to new research chun shing kwok warning sign
